ing: 1 head cauliflower, cut into small florets
2 cups creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle WhipÂ®)
n: Cauliflower Salad with Cheddar and Bacon
des: "My aunt has been bringing this cold dish to our family reunion for years, and there's never any left."
ins: Toss cauliflower, onion, and green bell pepper together in a bowl; add Cheddar cheese and crumbled bacon. Stir salad dressing and sugar together in a separate bowl, pour into cauliflower mixture, and toss until well coated. Chill in the refrigerator until flavors blend, about 2 hours.
